casebody.data:
Arthur A. Andrews, Appellant, v. Joseph J. Kelly et al., Constituting the Board of Police Pensions of the City of Buffalo, et al., Respondents. Argued June 12, 1945; decided July 19, 1945.

*960The following question was certified:

“ Did this Court err, as matter of law, in making its order of December 29,1944 V*

George E. Phillies for appellant. Andrew P. Ronan, Corporation Counsel (Fred C, Maloney and John E. Livermore of counsel), for respondents.

Order affirmed, without costs. Question certified answered in the negative. No opinion.

Concur: Lehman, Ch. J., Loughran, Lewis, Conway, Desmond, Thacher and Dye, JJ.
